data.title: John J. Mangan, MD, MHA
data.meta_description: John J. Mangan, M.D., M.H.A., is a fellowship trained orthopaedic spine surgeon and serves as Assistant Professor of Orthopaedic Surgery at Thomas Jefferson ...
